lead_paragraph: ''Germany has been good at making apologies for what it did during World War II. But the Japanese are not good at this, nor are the Chinese. They are always looking for excuses and forgetting misdeeds.'' ZHOU XIAOZHENG, a sociology professor at People's University. [A4]
